meanings.definition: To turn or rotate the hand or foot so that the palm or sole is facing upward or outward.
meanings.sent1: She supinates her hand to show the palm.
meanings.sent2: He supinates his foot to stretch the sole.
meanings.sent3: The cat supinates its paw to play with a toy.
meanings.sent4: The flower supinates towards the sunlight for warmth.
meanings.sent5: Supinating the hand makes it easier to hold a cup.

meanings.sent1: After a long day, she supinates on the couch to relax.
meanings.sent2: He supinates on the bed to rest his back.
meanings.sent3: The baby supinates in the crib, looking up at the mobile.
meanings.sent4: The cat supinates on the windowsill, basking in the sun.
meanings.sent5: Supinating on the grass feels refreshing on a hot day.
